availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Benjamin C. Smith (Brown County, Ohio, farmer)

body.p: Brown County, Ohio, farmer. Ohio native. Married to Sarah Keechter Smith in Brown County on May 19, 1851. Father of James Theo Smith, Sarah A. Smith, Hannah E. Smith, Benjamin C. Smith, Frank Smith. Farmer in Brown County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Green, p. 285.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Ohio, Brown County, Green, p. 28.
Ohio, County Marriage Records, Various Ohio County Courthouses, Brown County Marriages, Film #000384274, p. 219.
Find A Grave, "Benj C. Smith (Birth-May 14, 1873)," Memorial #123456703, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/123456703 (accessed February 28, 2019).
